Apps

Mochi Pets

Mochi Pets is a cute virtual pet game that lives on your Home Screen. Care for your pet throughout the day by feeding, petting and cleaning them. Play mini-games to earn coins and buy yummy treats.

Etch

Etch is the telephone game meets Pictionary. The gameplay is simple: take turns with your friends to draw and guess pictures until everyone has had a turn. Then it's time for the BIG REVEAL, where you reveal the hilarious chain of drawings and guesses.

iAim

iAim is a 3D aim trainer app. It is designed to help players practice and improve their aiming in popular mobile shooter games such as Fortnite, Critical Ops and Call of Duty: Mobile.
